name: updateFormById
description:
Add, update, or delete a form's parameters. This will alter how your users/customers will see and interact with the form when sending you files. 

**Notes**

*This call will **replace** your current form in its entirety.* If you want to keep any existing elements unchanged, be sure to submit the call with an element's current settings to preserve them.

ev-api-key.description: API Key required to make the API call.

ev-access-token.description: Access token required to make the API call.

id.description: ID of the form element. If you're adding a new element to the form, do not include this field.

order.description: The order the fields will be displayed to the recipient. Starts at 0.

isRequired.description: True is the form element is required for submission.

useAsFolderName.description: True if the submitted response should be used as the name for the new folder.

type.description: Type of form field to use.

formDescription.description: Set a description for the form that will be visible to recipients.

submitButtonText.description: Text to be displayed on the submission button.

successMessage.description: Text to be displayed when a recipient has submitted the form.

$ul: **attributes**: Attributes of the form including it's included fields and css styles
**elements**: Array of form fields defined for the form
**formDescription**: Text that appears at the top of a receive form
**submitButtonText**: Text that appears on the submit button for the form
**successMessage**: Message displayed to submitter after files are uploaded
**relationships**: Share relationship data of the form.
**responseStatus**: Http status code of the response.
